node.title: Episode 25: Czechowski & Tramelan: Early Work in Europe
node.description: Michael Czechowski is a man who divides opinion. He was the first Adventist to go to Europe as a missionary and accomplished a lot in his relatively short life. However, he did not go with the blessing of the church, and while he has many good traits of character, there are also some lessons that can be gleaned from his life.
